message.content:
Breakfast:
- Oatmeal with berries and flax seed (use non-dairy milk)
- Banana smoothie made with soy or coconut milk

Lunch:
- Salad with mixed greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, bell peppers, carrots, olives, and sunflower seeds. Dressing on the side.
- Fresh fruit (strawberries, blueberries, cantaloupe, etc.)

Dinner:
- Grilled chicken or fish with steamed vegetables
- Quinoa or brown rice as a side dish
- Salad with mixed greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, bell peppers, carrots, olives, and sunflower seeds. Dressing on the side.
- Fresh fruit (strawberries, blueberries, cantaloupe, etc.)

Snacks:
- Fruit smoothie made with soy or coconut milk
- Veggie sticks and hummus
- Roasted chickpeas seasoned with herbs and spices

This meal plan includes plenty of whole grains, fruits, vegetables, and lean proteins. It is balanced and nutritious, while still accommodating your dietary restrictions.
